page.title: 14RECREATION PORT VALE F.C.
page.content: Port Vale Football Club is the only club in the Football League that is not nnamed after the area that it is situated in.The ground is in Burslem, Stoke-on-Trent,but there is no such place as Port Vale.The team plays in the 4th Division. The team has never won a major honour,but it has good support averaging about 3,500 people per game,which is good for the 4th Division,and the fans are largely from the local area.They are very loyal,it is more like a family club.There is a local market based at the ground every week,and the players frequently visit our schools. Port Vale might not be the best team in the land,but it is a really sporting club.
